Mod.name: Vanilla HW2
Mod.info: Restores the game to its original, unmodified state.

Mod.name: Maethrillian
Mod.info: Maethrillian aims to provide a new balanced experience for Halo Wars 2, made to encourage playstyle diversity and interactivity. Changes have been made to almost every leader and unit.

Mod.name: Project Nuphillion
Mod.info: A Halo Wars 2 mod set after Halo Infinite, featuring new factions, lore-rich commanders, and gameplay overhauls. Join us to explore Nuphillion, test builds, and shape the future of this fan-driven project. Built by the community, for the community.

Mod.name: Hollow Wars
Mod.info: What does this mod do again.

Mod.name: The Yappening
Mod.info: The wily Grunt YapYap has reappeared in Halo Wars 2. Replay the Yappening through a this mod or try it out for the first time!

Mod.name: Fight Club
Mod.info: This is the mod used by Fight Club in their special streams. It mostly just changes player color and fixes some game issues.

Mod.name: Flood Onslaught
Mod.info: A small sideproject in which you play as a Survivor with a small unitbase and try to survive against constant Flood waves.

Mod.name: No Limits
Mod.info: A small mod that removes any population, ressource or timer limit.
